title: Two more Soviet newspaper cyrillics: Portable Radiotelephone
content:
“Карманный” and “Радиотелефон” in the article title, lines one and two, respectively...

The body text is the usual Literaturnaya.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090717011755im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/000rh4e2_4062.jpg)
author: ivandurakov
